message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I'm willing to part with it for $12,000.  I think it will be very valuable to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your position, but $9,500 is a bit too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?  I'm confident you'll see a great return on this investment.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I still believe that $9,500 is a fair price for the product. I would like to stick to that figure. Thank you for considering my position.
